low_range.description: Below normal: May indicate anemia or nutritional deficiencies.

high_range.description: Above normal: May indicate dehydration, lung disease, or heart disease.
high_range.recommendation: Stay hydrated and check oxygen levels.

low_range.description: Below normal: May indicate immune suppression or bone marrow disorders.

high_range.description: Above normal: Possible infection, inflammation, or blood disorders.

low_range.description: Below normal: May indicate bleeding disorders or bone marrow suppression.

high_range.description: Above normal: Could be due to dehydration or polycythemia.
